description: Specific properties that are required for material segment specifications shall be presented as material segment specification properties
title: Material segment specification property

links.dtdl:description: The material segment specification property(s) of this material segment specification property

value.title: Value

valueUnitOfMeasure.title: Value unit of measure

quantity.title: Quantity
